html:
Roles, voice types, and premiere cast
Role Voice type Premiere cast, 15 April 1738[13]
Serse (Xerxes), King of Persia soprano castrato
Arsamene, brother of Serse, in love with Romilda contralto
Amastre, princess of a neighbouring kingdom, betrothed to Serse but jilted by him contralto
Romilda, daughter of Ariodate, in love with Arsamene soprano
Atalanta, Romilda's sister, also in love with Arsamene soprano
Ariodate, a prince under Serse's command,father of Romilda and Atalanta bass
Elviro, Arsamene's servant baritone
